{'name': 'messi'}.response: Lionel Messi, born June 24, 1987, is an Argentine professional footballer widely regarded as one of the greatest players of all time. He spent the majority of his career at FC Barcelona, where he won 10 La Liga titles, 7 Copa del Rey trophies, and 4 UEFA Champions League titles. Messi has earned seven Ballon d'Or awards, breaking the record for most wins. Known for his dribbling, vision, and goal‑scoring prowess, he has set numerous records, including most goals for a single club and most goals in a calendar year. In 2021, he transferred to Paris Saint‑Germain, continuing to showcase elite performance. Internationally, Messi led Argentina to victory in the 2021 Copa América and the 2022 FIFA World Cup, cementing his legacy as a national hero. His influence extends beyond the pitch, with philanthropic efforts through the Leo Messi Foundation.
